A client socket for sending and receiving packets using the UDP protocol.

Creates an unconnected socket.
UDPClientSocket(InetAddress, int) - Constructor for class tage.networking.client.UDPClientSocket
Constructs a socket connected to the remote address and remote port specified.
UDPClientSocket(InetAddress, int, int) - Constructor for class tage.networking.client.UDPClientSocket
Constructs a socket bound to the local port and connected to the remote address and remote port.
UDPClientSocket(InetAddress, int, InetAddress, int) - Constructor for class tage.networking.client.UDPClientSocket
Constructs a socket bound to the local port and address and connected to the remote address and remote port.

update(float) - Method in interface tage.input.IInputManager
update(float time) instructs the IInputManager object to update its notion of the state of all input devices about which it knows, and then to invoke any IActions associated with device components based on the IInputManager.INPUT_ACTION_TYPE of the IAction.
update(float) - Method in class tage.input.InputManager
update(float time) causes the InputManager to update its information on the state of all input devices and then invoke, in the manner specified by the IInputManager.INPUT_ACTION_TYPE of each component, any IActions associated with components.
